statements: SELECT * FROM medical_data WHERE patient_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT device_id, patient_id, timestamp FROM medical_data WHERE device_type = 'Blood Pressure Monitor';
SELECT device_id, data_record -> 'blood_pressure' AS blood_pressure FROM medical_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT timestamp, patient_id FROM medical_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS data_records_count FROM medical_data;
SELECT * FROM medical_data WHERE patient_id = 'a1b2c3d4-1234-5678-9876-abcdef123456' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM medical_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM medical_data WHERE device_type = 'Blood Pressure Monitor' ORDER BY patient_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, data_record->'heart_rate' AS heart_rate FROM medical_data WHERE data_record @> '{"heart_rate": 70}' AND timestamp >= '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM medical_data WHERE device_type = 'Glucose Monitor' AND data_record->>'blood_sugar_level' > '100' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_devices;
SELECT device_type, device_id FROM medical_devices WHERE device_type = 'Pacemaker';
SELECT * FROM electronic_health_records ORDER BY record_timestamp DESC;
SELECT record_data -> 'diagnosis' AS diagnosis, record_timestamp FROM electronic_health_records WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_id, device_type, patient_id FROM medical_devices JOIN electronic_health_records ON medical_devices.patient_id = electronic_health_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM medical_devices WHERE device_type = 'Pacemaker';
SELECT * FROM medical_devices WHERE patient_id = '2043f3d0-ff0b-4d18-bcab-11b5cd8e65d0';
SELECT device_id, patient_id FROM medical_devices WHERE device_type = 'Blood Pressure Monitor' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_type, patient_id, device_data FROM medical_devices JOIN electronic_health_records ON medical_devices.patient_id = electronic_health_records.patient_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT record_id, record_data FROM electronic_health_records WHERE record_timestamp >= '2022-01-01T00:00:00Z' ORDER BY record_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_devices WHERE device_status = 'active';
SELECT device_name, device_id FROM medical_devices ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_information WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM electronic_health_records WHERE admission_date >= '2021-01-01' AND discharge_date <= '2021-03-31';
SELECT device_id, device_name, patient_id, device_status FROM medical_devices JOIN patient_information ON medical_devices.patient_id = patient_information.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM medical_devices
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM medical_devices WHERE device_status = 'active'
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_information WHERE age > 50
SELECT device_id, device_name, patient_id, device_status FROM medical_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC
SELECT * FROM electronic_health_records WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM devices LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, device_name FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM patients ORDER BY dob ASC, patient_name DESC
SELECT device_id, record_id, sync_date FROM device_data_sync ORDER BY sync_date DESC
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT device_name, patient_id FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'P%' AND patient_id = '01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef'
SELECT diagnosis, prescription FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis = 'High Blood Pressure' OR prescription = 'Medication A'
SELECT * FROM device_data_sync ORDER BY sync_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT device_name, COUNT(device_name) AS total_devices FROM devices GROUP BY device_name HAVING COUNT(device_name) >= 2
SELECT * FROM medical_devices;
SELECT device_name, patient_id FROM medical_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM health_records WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT device_id, data_time, data_value FROM device_data WHERE data_type = 'heart_rate' ORDER BY data_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT device_name, data_collected FROM medical_devices WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT device_id, data_time, data_type FROM device_data WHERE data_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY data_time DESC;
